title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.8 - Powered excavating equipment limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-3.8 - Powered excavating equipment limitations

State Regulations

After verifying the location of an underground facility, the excavator shall not employ powered or mechanical excavating equipment
closer than four inches in any direction from the staked, marked or otherwise
designated or known outside diameter or perimeter of such facility or its
protective coating unless agreed to in writing by the operator of the affected
underground facility. Any such written agreement shall be furnished to the
excavator by the operator, upon request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-3.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
